attributes.action: Order an investigation into former Prime Ministers expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In your attempt to be more transparent reguarding MP's expenses it would be in the public interest to give details of the previous Prime Minister Tony Blair's expenses.This is public money and we would like to know what we as a nation have bought

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
